item.title: Database - SQL - Query Writing
item.description: Table of Contents Why Query? SELECT Statement WHERE Condition DISTINCT Keyword AS Keyword ORDER BY Keyword TOP Keyword Summary Why Query Now that we have got our tables storing data (records), let’s start asking questions (queries) about those data. SELECT statement This statement is used to retrieve data from the database. Syntax: SELECT <selectList> FROM <tableName> WHERE <conditions>; The SELECT clause defines the target list of attributes/values to be returned.
